Title: Establishes the New York state community doula directory for doulas serving Medicaid patients
Summary: Requires the department of health to establish and maintain the New York state community doula directory for doulas on such department's website for the purposes of Medicaid reimbursement and promoting doula services to Medicaid recipients; establishes criteria for admittance into the New York state community doula directory; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add Art 25 Title 6-A §§2594-a - 2594-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing the New York state community doula directory for doulas serving Medicaid patients
